Marc,
a couple of weeks ago a new method was added to J2EE's IVirtualComponent class: 
getRootFolder. Corresponding changes were made in the Web service component to 
call this method. The error you're getting below suggests you somehow have a 
build with the updated Web service component, but not the updated J2EE 
component. I cannot reproduce this problem on recent builds.

What build (and patches, if any) are you running on please?

Thanks - CB.

Hi,

I took the official builds. (Eclipse 3.1; WTP RC1; GEF 3.1; EMF 2.1; JEM-
I20050623).

But I tried it with a "fresh" eclipse installation and this problem seems to be 
solved.
Thanks much for double-checking this, Marc. Closing.
